name: Dungeon Escape Boss 2019
description:
You are a young dungeon athlete who is run and climb on a moving and rotating stone to escape from it. As a stone climber, you have to tackle all obstacles and fires stone fall down from the sky. Try to collect gems and coins from terrains to increase your score. Also, try to avoid any crashes and dodge the spikes or other rotating stones while climbing on the rough terrains.
Enjoy freestyle climbing stunts on scary and rotating stones that are filled with hurdles. Be a runner and win that stone climbing contest to earn scores.
**Main Features**
• Extremely smooth controls
• 3d graphics and interesting gameplay
• Multiple dungeon runner characters
• Set your position before taking the jump from one stone to other
